content: good grief yarn & provisions **percussion** by mariah ricciuto of good grief yarn & provisions percussion is a triangle shaped scarf knit in garter stitch with a lace hole edging **needle & notion requirements** * 4 5mm 32-40 circular needles or size needed to obtain gauge * scissors * tapestry needle **gauge** 19 sts x 46 row = 4 10cm in garter stitch on 4 5mm needles or size needed to obtain gauge after blocking **yarn requirements** you will need 1 ball of either yarnalia wooly 1 or cascade pacific 2 100g/200m 2 balls of drops merino extra fine 3 50g/110m or 3 balls of sandnes garn peer gynt 4 50g/91m or 185m of dk or worsted weight yarn **sizing & fit** the percussion scarf is one size with the following measurements approximately 45 long and 9 wide example 1 yarnalia wooly in colour whipped cream 1 https //goodgriefyarn com/products/yarnalia-wooly _pos=1&_psq=wooly&_ss=e&_v=1 0 2 https //goodgriefyarn com/products/cascade-yarns-pacific _pos=1&_psq=pacific&_ss=e&_v=1 0 3 https //goodgriefyarn com/products/drops-merino-extra-fine _pos=1&_psq=merino+extra&_ss=e&_v=1 0 4 https //goodgriefyarn com/products/sandnes-garn-peer-gynt-peer-gynt-pk _pos=1&_psq=peer&_ss=e&_v=1 0
